text: American German is a dialect of German language, spoken by more than 1.06 million people, In the year 2009â€“2013, the dialect was used a lot in the Midwestern region of the United States, along with the German Texan spoken in northeastern and the southern part of Texas. In the 15th century, Germans invaded Pennsylvania, and their language spread across the Midwest region to the South region. ==Related pages== * American English * Brazilian Portuguese * Canadian French * Mexican Spanish ==References== Category:Languages of North America Category:German culture Category:German language Category:West Germanic languages
title: American German
